casebody.data:
IN RE: ADOPTION OF: A.A.P., a Minor Petition of: N.G.P., Father In re: Adoption of: M.M.P., a Minor Petition of: N.G.P., Father In re: Adoption of: P.E.P., a Minor Petition of: N.G.P., Father No. 764 MAL 2018
No. 765 MAL 2018
No. 766 MAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. January 11, 2019

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 11th day of January, 2019, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
